main event: Observers watched a strange plate-shaped object travel low across the sky on August 15, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to be solid, grey, and glasslike in appearance., It disappeared quickly, within the time it took to blink., The object was seen near an airfield and was moving in a straight line toward the observer., No sound was noted during the observation., The witness has a collection of UFO literature and is confident they are not mistaken.
witness description: A 15-year-old boy with a strong interest in UFOs.
